type.name: WeatherAlphaQuad
type.summary: Represents a set of alpha channel for each of the four parts of the day: sunrise, day, sunset and night.

property.name: Day
property.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel during the day.

property.name: Night
property.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel during the night.

property.name: Sunrise
property.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel during the sunrise.

property.name: Sunset
property.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel during the sunset.
